name: Merge Survival
description:
You are the last man standing! Merge guns and upgrade your machine gun turrets to defeat endless waves of zombies.

How many days can you survive?

-- FEATURES --
- Merge to craft ever more powerful guns.
- Upgrade your machine gun turrets to increase firepower.
- Use items to get out of tough challenges.
- Boost your income with useful perks.
- Challenging waves of zombies and bosses with unique traits.
- Tons of unique guns and levels to unlock.

-- Support --
Having problems or suggestions? Contact us at ms_support@potatoplay.com
